code_to_pdf.pdf_generator.html_to_numerized_pdf(input_html, output_pdf, start_page)[source]¶

Generate numerized pdf pages from a html file

Parameters:
  • input_html – Path to input html
  • output – Path where output pdf will be generated
  • start_page (int) – number written in the first page of the PDF
Returns:

last page number written + 1
Return type:

int
